attributes.action: Humbly request Network Rail to supply a redundant Bridge and Supports to the Wensleydale Railway.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I understand that having recently visited the Wensleydale Railway during my holiday break that ther need a replacment "railway bridge" in order for them to run services from Redmire to Castle Bolton. The previous bridge was washed away and they need the link to provide services to a major visitor attraction. It could be a major publicity coup for Network Rail if they could provide a redundant safe Railway Bridge removed as part of their "Bridgemaster" replacement scheme and would boost visitor numbers to North Yorkshire and Castle Bolton not least possible freight movements removed from the ailing road network.
